Action.body: ~odowdaibm can you please drive this one? Thanks

Action.author: markparz
Action.body: People currently testing BYFN & WYFA, plus a lot of clarification has been added to .yaml files.

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Marking this as Done per RC1 though we can always continue to iterate and improve, I think it is adequate at this point. The SDKs could be improved most.
